name: One Whale Trip (2013)
description:
One Whale Trip (2013)

You are a whale and fell in love with a submarine. Swim through multiple underwater levels, meet different characters (and debris!) and collect pearls. Because we are so nice to you, you can jump underwater to avoid obstacles. And of course, swimming on different lanes to avoid obstacles works just as well.

A HTML5 port of our PyWeek 15 entry.
Featured in Mozilla's June 2013 Dev Derby.
Artwork CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 2012 barbara nedeved.

Project homepage: http://thp.io/2013/onewhaletrip/
